summary: Comprehensive testing of EaziWage earned wage access platform MVP completed. Tested backend APIs, frontend UI, role-based authentication, and key user flows.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no token provided
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works correctly, just different status code

integration_issues.issue: Employer unable to login immediately after registration in some cases

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero, features, countries, CTA sections
User registration for employee role with proper validation
User registration for employer role with proper validation
Role-based navigation after registration (employee -> onboarding, employer -> onboarding)
Employee login and redirect to dashboard/onboarding
Admin user creation and login functionality
Admin dashboard with stats cards and quick actions
Admin employers management page with data display
Role-based access control (403 for wrong roles)
Database integration with user, employer, employee collections
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor issue with employer login flow - investigate session/token persistence after registration. Consider adding better error messages for failed logins.
